title: Our Last Minute Game Awards Predictions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.11.24
description:
Wishlist Empyreal NOW on PlayStation, Xbox and Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1377700/Empyreal/ 

Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $35-off Aura’s best-selling Carver Mat frames

What hype announcements could be at the Game Awards? Some big Nintendo and Pokemon news, and Astro Bot is getting a big update.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST - Fixing the Game Awards
 - The STREAM is the new Fortnite tactical shooter mode
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:00 - Housekeeping
         -  The Roper Report   -
00:09:24 - The Game Awards will reportedly have at least two ‘holy sh*t’ game announcements
00:22:32 - A couple of Game Awards confirmations
00:34:34 - Nintendo now owns 100% of Monolith Soft
00:41:37 - Pokémon Teams Up With Wallace and Gromit Studio for Mystery Project
00:44:43 - A Very Sonic Christmas - Let’s watch this live together
00:47:11 - Astro Bot is getting a new update with a new level
00:51:07 - Wee News!
00:53:24 - SuperChats
00:58:00 - You‘re Wrong
